question: Recently, the Government has introduced a new logo called “Jaivik Bharat”. The logo is related to which of the following?
option4: Piped Natural Gas (PNG) supply to households
explanation: Recently, the agriculture minister launched the Food Safety and Standards (Organic Foods) Regulations 2017, along with the “Jaivik Bharat” logo and 'Indian Organic Integrity Database Portal. The “Indian Organic Integrity Data Base” and the “Jaivik Bharat” will help consumers to easily verify the authenticity of organic food in the country.
